languages.text: "А ты и не просишь о помощи, элантах — лишь задаешь вопросы, ответы на которые неважны или скрыты тенями. Изучи место. Говори с теми, кто знает..." {n}Ирлиэт медлит и чуть тише добавляет.{/n} "Пустяк для тебя и непреодолимая преграда для меня, коль один облик мой внушает страх и подозрения. Когда узнаешь что-то — поведай мне. Быть может, тогда мои ответы пригодятся в твоих поисках".

"But you are not asking for help, elantach — you are merely asking questions, the answers to which are either unimportant or wreathed in shadow. Explore this place. Speak to those who know..." {n}Yrliet hesitates and then adds more quietly,{/n} "A simple task for you and an insurmountable challenge for me, since my very appearance provokes fear and suspicion. When you learn anything, tell me. Perhaps then my answers will be helpful to your search."
languages.original_text: "А ты и не просишь о помощи, элантах — лишь задаешь вопросы, ответы на которые неважны или скрыты тенями. Изучи место. Говори с теми, кто знает..." {n}Ирлиэт медлит и чуть тише добавляет.{/n} "Пустяк для тебя и непреодолимая преграда для меня, коль один облик мой внушает страх и подозрения. Когда узнаешь что-то — поведай мне. Быть может, тогда мои ответы пригодятся в твоих поисках".

When you learn anything, tell me. Perhaps then my answers will be helpful to your search."

"But you are not asking for help, elantach — you are merely asking questions, the answers to which are either unimportant or wreathed in shadow. Explore this place. Speak to those who know..." {n}Yrliet hesitates and then adds more quietly,{/n} "A simple task for you and an insurmountable challenge for me, since my very appearance provokes fear and suspicion. When you learn anything, tell me. Perhaps then my answers will be helpful to your search."

languages.text: “但你也并没有在寻求帮助，外界人。你只是单纯地在问问题，而这些问题的答案要么并不重要，要么被笼罩在阴影之中。探索这个地方，与那些知道真相的人谈谈吧……”{n}伊莉耶特犹豫片刻，之后小声补充道。{/n}“这对你而言易如反掌，但对我而言却是无法克服的挑战，因为我的出现会引起人们的恐惧与怀疑。如果你了解到什么情况的话，请告诉我吧。或许到了那个时候，我的答案会对你的调查起到帮助。”
languages.original_text: "But you are not asking for help, elantach — you are merely asking questions, the answers to which are either unimportant or wreathed in shadow. Explore this place. Speak to those who know..." {n}Yrliet hesitates and then adds more quietly,{/n} "A simple task for you and an insurmountable challenge for me, since my very appearance provokes fear and suspicion. When you learn anything, tell me. Perhaps then my answers will be helpful to your search."

traits.locale_text: “但你也并没有在寻求帮助，外界人。你只是单纯地在问问题，而这些问题的答案要么并不重要，要么被笼罩在阴影之中。探索这个地方，与那些知道真相的人谈谈吧……”{/n}伊莉耶特犹豫片刻，之后小声补充道。{n}“这对你而言易如反掌，但对我而言却是无法克服的挑战，因为我的出现会引起人们的恐惧与怀疑。如果你了解到什么情况的话，请告诉我吧。或许到了那个时候，我的答案会对你的调查起到帮助。”

languages.text: «Pero no estás pidiendo ayuda, elantach: solo haces preguntas cuyas respuestas son irrelevantes o incógnitas. Explora este lugar. Habla con los que saben...». {n}Yrliet duda por un momento antes de añadir en voz baja:{/n} «Una tarea sencilla para ti y un desafío insuperable para mí, pues mi mera apariencia siembra el miedo y la sospecha. Cuando descubras algo, compártelo conmigo. Tal vez entonces mis respuestas sean más esclarecedoras».
languages.original_text: "But you are not asking for help, elantach — you are merely asking questions, the answers to which are either unimportant or wreathed in shadow. Explore this place. Speak to those who know..." {n}Yrliet hesitates and then adds more quietly,{/n} "A simple task for you and an insurmountable challenge for me, since my very appearance provokes fear and suspicion. When you learn anything, tell me. Perhaps then my answers will be helpful to your search."

traits.locale_text: «Pero no estás pidiendo ayuda, elantach: solo haces preguntas cuyas respuestas son irrelevantes o incógnitas. Explora este lugar. Habla con los que saben...». {n}Yrliet duda por un momento antes de añadir en voz baja:{/n} «Una tarea sencilla para ti y un desafío insuperable para mí, pues mi mera apariencia siembra el miedo y la sospecha. Cuando descubras algo, compártelo conmigo. Tal vez entonces mis respuestas sean más esclarecedoras».

languages.text: 「だが、助力を請うてはいないだろう、エランタ。あなたは質問をしているだけだ。その質問に対する答えは重要でないか、あるいは闇に包まれているかのどちらか。この場所で調査を行うといい。事情を知る者と話せ…」{n}ユリエットはためらっていたが、一段と声を落として付け加える。{/n}「あなたには簡単な仕事でも、我には越えがたい困難だ。この見た目では恐怖と疑念を呼び起こしてしまうからな。何か分かったら教えて欲しい。そしたらきっと、あなたの調査に対して有益な回答ができるだろう」
languages.original_text: "But you are not asking for help, elantach — you are merely asking questions, the answers to which are either unimportant or wreathed in shadow. Explore this place. Speak to those who know..." {n}Yrliet hesitates and then adds more quietly,{/n} "A simple task for you and an insurmountable challenge for me, since my very appearance provokes fear and suspicion. When you learn anything, tell me. Perhaps then my answers will be helpful to your search."

traits.locale_text: 「だが、助力を請うてはいないだろう、エランタ。あなたは質問をしているだけだ。その質問に対する答えは重要でないか、あるいは闇に包まれているかのどちらか。この場所で調査を行うといい。事情を知る者と話せ…」{n}ユリエットはためらっていたが、一段と声を落として付け加える。{/n}「あなたには簡単な仕事でも、我には越えがたい困難だ。この見た目では恐怖と疑念を呼び起こしてしまうからな。何か分かったら教えて欲しい。そしたらきっと、あなたの調査に対して有益な回答ができるだろう」

languages.text: "Aber Ihr bittet doch gar nicht um Hilfe, Elantach – Ihr stellt lediglich Fragen, deren Antworten entweder unwichtig sind oder sich im Schatten verbergen. Erkundet diesen Ort. Sprecht mit denen, die Bescheid wissen ..." {n}Yrliet zögert und fügt dann leiser hinzu:{/n} "Eine einfache Aufgabe für Euch und eine unüberwindbare Herausforderung für mich, da schon meine Erscheinung für Angst und Misstrauen sorgt. Solltet Ihr etwas erfahren, sagt es mir. Vielleicht werden meine Antworten dann hilfreich für Eure Suche sein."
languages.original_text: "But you are not asking for help, elantach — you are merely asking questions, the answers to which are either unimportant or wreathed in shadow. Explore this place. Speak to those who know..." {n}Yrliet hesitates and then adds more quietly,{/n} "A simple task for you and an insurmountable challenge for me, since my very appearance provokes fear and suspicion. When you learn anything, tell me. Perhaps then my answers will be helpful to your search."

traits.locale_text: "Aber Ihr bittet doch gar nicht um Hilfe, Elantach – Ihr stellt lediglich Fragen, deren Antworten entweder unwichtig sind oder sich im Schatten verbergen. Erkundet diesen Ort. Sprecht mit denen, die Bescheid wissen ..." {n}Yrliet zögert und fügt dann leiser hinzu:{/n} "Eine einfache Aufgabe für Euch und eine unüberwindbare Herausforderung für mich, da schon meine Erscheinung für Angst und Misstrauen sorgt. Solltet Ihr etwas erfahren, sagt es mir. Vielleicht werden meine Antworten dann hilfreich für Eure Suche sein."

languages.text: « Mais vous ne demandez pas d'aide, elantach. Vous vous contentez de poser des questions, dont les réponses sont soit sans importance, soit nimbées d'ombre. Explorez ces lieux. Parlez à ceux qui savent... » {n}Yrliet hésite un instant, puis ajoute en baissant la voix :{/n} « Une tâche élémentaire pour vous, mais un défi insurmontable pour moi, car ma simple apparence suscite la crainte et le soupçon. Si vous apprenez quoi que ce soit, venez m'en faire part. Alors, mes réponses vous seront peut-être utiles dans vos recherches. »
languages.original_text: "But you are not asking for help, elantach — you are merely asking questions, the answers to which are either unimportant or wreathed in shadow. Explore this place. Speak to those who know..." {n}Yrliet hesitates and then adds more quietly,{/n} "A simple task for you and an insurmountable challenge for me, since my very appearance provokes fear and suspicion. When you learn anything, tell me. Perhaps then my answers will be helpful to your search."

Parlez à ceux qui savent... » {n}Yrliet hésite un instant, puis ajoute en baissant la voix :{/n} « Une tâche élémentaire pour vous, mais un défi insurmontable pour moi, car ma simple apparence suscite la crainte et le soupçon. Si vous apprenez quoi que ce soit, venez m'en faire part. Alors, mes réponses vous seront peut-être utiles dans vos recherches. »

Speak to those who know..." {n}Yrliet hesitates and then adds more quietly,{/n} "A simple task for you and an insurmountable challenge for me, since my very appearance provokes fear and suspicion. When you learn anything, tell me. Perhaps then my answers will be helpful to your search."

languages.text: "Sen yardım istemiyorsun ki elantach, yalnızca yanıtları önemsiz veya gölgelerle kaplı sorular soruyorsun. Keşfet burayı, bilgi sahipleriyle konuş." {n}Yrliet bir an tereddüt edip kısık sesle ekliyor.{/n} "Senin için basit bir iş, görünüşüm korku ve şüphe uyandırdığından benim içinse imkânsız. Bir şeyler öğrendiğinde haber ver. Yanıtlarım, aramalarında sana yardımcı olabilir."
languages.original_text: "But you are not asking for help, elantach — you are merely asking questions, the answers to which are either unimportant or wreathed in shadow. Explore this place. Keşfet burayı, bilgi sahipleriyle konuş." {n}Yrliet bir an tereddüt edip kısık sesle ekliyor:{/n} "Senin için basit bir iş, görünüşüm korku ve şüphe uyandırdığından benim içinse mümkünatsız. Bir şeyler öğrendiğinde haber ver. Yanıtlarım, aramalarında sana yardımcı olabilir."
